Detailed Description

This is the class which performs all the XML parsing of the webupdate script.

It uses the wxFileSystem facilities to download the file (see Load) thus you can load both local & remote files. Use the GetAllPackages to do the XML parsing of the entire script or GetPackage to parse a single package.

bool wxWebUpdateXMLScript::IsOk (   )  const [inline]

bool wxWebUpdateXMLScript::Load (  const wxString &  uri  )  [virtual]
 

Parses the XML script located at the given URI.

This function can open any resource which can be handled by wxFileSystem but it should typically be used to load a file stored in a webserver. Returns TRUE if the document was successfully parsed.

Member Data Documentation

wxVersion wxWebUpdateXMLScript::m_strWebUpdateVersion [protected]
 

The version of this WebUpdate XML script.

This is different from the XML version (which should always be "1.0"); this is the version of the WebUpdate DTD which is followed by this doc.
